entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
